name: project helper
description: platform to share project ideas, helping other programmers to create something interesting while - for example - learning a new programming language.
features: link repositories to ideas (as reference implementation)

name: habit enforcer
description: a simple, self-hostable and privacy protecting service that sends push notifications to a mobile device, to remind the user of their goals / habits
features: user account only requires password; use uuid for each individual device
pw reset via push notification to device
server can be self hosted: server url must be configurable in app

name: how to be a hero online
description: a platform supporting players in a game of www.howtobeahero.de tabletop rpg system
features: game master can create a game lobby where people can join
virtually roll a dice, if prompted by game master
players can create a character sheet
game master can award skill points for the player to distribute
images can be shared in a game lobby (map sketches, items, ...)
inventory system for player (game master can send items)
